BACKGROUND.szDescription: Enter a description here. This will show up in the laptop and can be up to 256 letters long.
Militant veterans of the ANC's struggle were not only versed in jungle warfare, but also in political theory.
Travel to virgin soil, seek fascinating species, and KILL THEM ALL.
After several tours of duty in the middle east,#10;Grizzly became a freelancer.
Working day and night in her car repair shop when she's not travelling around the world, Vicky is a very versed mechanic. But she never overcame her fear of confined spaces.
The difference to MacGyver is that Trevor does use guns . . . and bombs.
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?.
Ivan's training program is the stuff of nightmares, but it pays off evidently.
Just because it doesn't involve shooting, it doesn't have to be less dangerous.
After serving in Chechnya, Igor is used to harsh environments.
Survival and ambush tactics were part of Shadow's intense training.
A sapper can only make two mistakes in his life. The first one is his career choice.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Fidel is very apt at solving problems with various applications of destruction, not so much at moderation.
While she isn't a full-blown doctor, Cynthia is always a welcome sight to her comrades in the field.
Some people do not join this business out of necessity. While easy to label them as sissy aristocrats, some are actually quite capable, as they have received the best training money can buy.
Your exploits earned you the respect and recognition you deserve. Who needs legs?
That combination definitely spices up your resume.
Just like boyscouts. But with violence. So not really like boyscouts at all.
Like a surgeon... cutting for the very first time... Just kidding. Spider is THE person to seek if your guts are spilling out.
Cliff is a highly qualified doctor, though there once was a... darker... time in his life.
In longer and larger conflicts, former prison guards are natural choices for running prison camps.
This might be Frank's last tour - there are several private organisations that are interested in recruiting him to train their staff.
Turned down by her big love, Buzz is currently filled with a lot of hatred. She chose the right job it seems.
Blurring the line between police and military, SWAT teams are used in urban operations too dangerous for normal law enforcement.
Blurring the line between police and military, SWAT teams are used in urban operations too dangerous for normal law enforcement.
Blasting sounds, fireworks, screaming people - isn't it odd how similar an acting stage is to the battlefield?
The Green Berets are a special operations force tasked with unconventional warfare.
If you want to put your life at risk, might as well earn cash by doing so...
When offered to take it or leave it, you always choose 'take'.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
While most may prefer an easy, safe life, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Dr. Q is trained in the arts of ancient Chinese medicine. Not the fastest way to cure a patient, but it works.
Becoming a mercenary is a natural step for many gang members - job's the same, the tools and pay are much better.
Who needs an exam to be a practicing healer?

The british Special Air Service is one of the world's most famous special forces units, and is not only trained in survival techniques in all environments, it is also exceptionally well versed in airborne missions.
Just like boyscouts. But with violence. So not really like boyscouts at all.
Fresh out of school, with a diploma still warm in hand, it's time to finally make yourself a living.
While most may prefer an easy, safe life, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Your childhood left you with significant personal issues that have yet to be solved.
You chose the awesome life of a mercenary: visit new places, meet new people, and kill them. And even get paid for it.
Overalls, straw sticking out of boots, and an inseparable blade of grass in the mouth - but with a knack for tools and all things mechanical.
There is something extremely not right here, but he has obviously useful talents for this business.
Knowledge learned from years of keeping books for an arms dealer leads to better deals when buying and selling guns and gear.
University taught you many things, but combat isn't one of them.
Given the nature of today's drugs, addicts can make fearsome, yet unreliable, opponents.
This... this is it! I get it now. HEAR THAT? I GET IT NOW!
Flunked out of the military academy, but not yet finished.
Turning the urban environment into a jungle is a tough job, but somebody's gotta do it!
Look at this guy. Now look at you. Still feel like escaping?
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
Not needed!
The only hope left for his oppressed people, Miguel IS the revolution.
Miguel's right hand, Carlos keeps the men in line.
Aid worker turned rebel, Ira does what she can to keep the rebels alive.
One might mistake him for a simpleton, but being alive after all these years proves Dimitri is made of sterner stuff.
Once building his bombs for the IRA, Devin recently considered selling his devices to other customers as well.
Not needed!
The indigenous people of Metavira have adjusted to the hostile jungle there. After the liberation, some joined the foreigners and sought their luck elsewhere.
No politician would admit it, but the same governments that hunt him employ him.
Not needed!
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left you scarred for the rest of your life. You're not afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left you scarred for the rest of your life. You're not afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
A veteran of international conflict, Iggy found himself on the wrong side of the conflict until he joined the rebellion.
Frustrated by the anguish and misery he sees everyday, Vince has decided it might be time for a more active resistance against the queen.
Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
Not needed!
Not entirely sane, not entirely crazy, not entirely anything, your life is at a crossroads.
When the Confederacy lost the war, your family moved further south . . . and is still fighting . . . everybody.
In a warzone without the usual comforts, it is very useful to have people who can maintain your gear.
Living the life of an evil ruler of a small country certainly leads to astonishing survival talents.
Old people. They never seem to sleep.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?.
A leader of nurses, aides, and candy-stripers -- oh, and healer of mercenaries.
Do you wonder why Rat is a bit on the nervous side?
Notorious mass-murderer? Insane criminal? They're just jealous.
Wanted by Interpol, a meat cleaver killer and master of disguise.
Not needed!
Turning the urban environment into a jungle is a tough job, but somebody's gotta do it!
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
You don't want to know.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
So much angst.
You know the risk selling weapons to both sides, but the profit margin is just that good.
A friendly face can make violence unnecessary...
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Superbly trained, utterly loyal, and willing to pay the ultimate price. What more could a potential employer want?
For many people, their trade IS trade.
Travel to virgin soil, seek fascinating species, and KILL THEM ALL.
Flying helicopters is second nature to him, as is getting the heck out of trouble!
Pablo 'takes care of' the cargo coming in and going out of the Drassen airport.
Sal tries to handle the cargo manager job.
Many devout followers of any religion or cult are surprisingly violent and zealous if pushed into the right (or wrong) direction.
Not needed!
Former law enforcement personnel often seek work in the mercenary world, and are the logical choice for handling captives.
Being held and tortured in a regime prison left you scarred for the rest of your life. You're not afraid of death anymore - but there are other things to be afraid of.
Not needed!
Not needed!
Working in a mine is hard, punishing work. No wonder some start to look for easier cash.
Pleasing customers in a most unsavory way while keeping her charges captive.
Respected for his wisdom and knowledge of Arulcan history.
Totally clueless . . . about her son.
Mess with him, you mess with the entire family...
Paranoid, ignorant, fascist - yep, that's you.
Wanted by Interpol, terrorists know how to live undercover unnoticed.
Jake deals in junk . . . and other stuff.
And there goes the Geneva convention...
Dave used to run a service station . . . when there was fuel for vehicles.
The Queen had Skipper's family murdered, and his home burned to the ground.
Not needed!
Could you take a picture, please?
Could you take a picture, please?
This mercenary General is definitely not in your squad!
Drafted into the Arulcan Army, this sergeant would rather be at home with his family.
Rich classist bankrolling the Queen for social status.
Target of thrown popcorn in cinemas around the world, scoffed by critics yet adored by loyal fans.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
In his prime, he'd have put all you youngsters to shame.
In a warzone without the usual comforts, it is very useful to have people who can maintain your gear.
For many people, their trade IS trade.
Got something that needs fixing? Here's your man.
Single-minded scientist working for the Queen . . .
While not full-blown doctors, nurses are still in high demand in warzones, due to that grim business.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Married to The Warden, two-faced, cowardly, unfaithful to the point of facilitating murder.
One would expect the constant abuse and ridicule you withstand to eventually lead you to reconsider your life choices. Nope.
Not needed!
Not needed!
The best (and likely only) heli mechanic in Arulco.
A personal friend of Deidranna and a ruthless exploiter. How did you manage to recruit her?

Pursuing your insatiable appetite for knowledge led you into committing atrocities for The Queen, which you now seek to rectify.

Pointing the gun in the right direction is a start, but someone needs to teach these people how to teach other people where to point.
Doormen make good soldiers in close combat, though the killing part is a change (hopefully).
Leaving your homeland has left you bitter. Learning to cut human flesh relieved your pain.
Let's hope you are as good at evading bullets as you are at evading knifes while tied to a board.
Formed after the disastrous Munich massacre in 1972, GSG9 is a german counter-terrorism unit.
The Studies and Observations Group was a classified special forces unit conducting unconventional warfare in Vietnam.
Explosives experts are hard to find . . . but everyone wishes they hadn't found this one!
You know all about your teammates, wether or not they care.
It might be more of a spectacle than actual fighting, but getting thrown around a ring without breaking a neck still takes a lot of skill.

Several years of evaluating human lives ironically left your own health in disrepair - cheap cigarrettes flushed down with strong coffee took their toll. The object-like way you started to treat your patients also doesn't make you very popular.
Pops has seen it all. What's left to frighten him?
Due to extreme short-sightedness Wally is a poor shot with next to no chance of improvement.
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back is a quest for the best!
A versatile and educated doctor can save a human life, no matter what his patient caught - a virus or a bullet.
Air conditioning, watered-down coffee, and some papers to push - what else can you expect from life?
When they said "those who can, do; those who can't, teach" - they were talking about Lance.
Pretending to be anything and everything he is not, nobody knows who he actually is.
If your team ever needs someone to throw grenades on an even field, you'll be the man.
No matter if it's thirty-years-old junk or the latest electronic gadget, a tech whiz can rewire, reassemble and reconfigure it with their eyes closed.

Through rain, snow, sleet and hail, the mail must get through - and IT NEVER STOPS!
There are different accounts of how you've managed to leave the confinement, but everyone agrees - you should go back.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battle, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
With Gary as a brother, is it any wonder that Larry drinks so hard?
Valley girl wrench wench, and perhaps the best of the Roachburn siblings!
While not full-blown doctors, nurses are still in high demand in warzones, due to that grim business.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battle, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.

When you enter a ward, all medical personnel tries to look overly busy or hides around corners in a futile attempt to avoid you. The List of your possible afflictions just keeps getting bigger and bigger!
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back while under fire is a quest for the best!
Cut off from everyone, Manuel is a natural survivor.
A car mechanic is very useful, as long as you actually have a car.
Professional assassins are obviously used to killing, though might come in conflict with more idealistic team members.
Spam was frustrated by the lack of a strong mandate that forced him to do nothing. On the plus side, he is used to being fired at.
The Rangers form the elite of the US Army infantry.
Prison is college for criminals . . . if they survive the course load. Jimmy passed with honors.
Some people display a knack for shooting, and a disturbing aggression against innocent paper bull's-eyes.
Bob is no stranger to tense situations, and lets others feel that as well.
While most may prefer an easy, safe life, you've chosen the life of a gun for hire - and embraced it. This is who you really are.
Organized crime is found anywhere. No exceptions.
You make things go BOOM!
A somewhat unorthodox background for a mercenary, former lawyers might be useful when there's a deal to be made on a knife's edge.
When you want to break an enemy's morale by blowing up his privy, it's time to get yourself a qualified pyrotechnician.
Everyone can cut human flesh - but sewing it back is a quest for the best!
An expert in the workings and history of firearms, the army's curious assortment of arms is this man's dream come true.
Well, that didn't go as planned.
The rebellion against the imperialists has succeeded in his country so Hector has since become a mercenary rebel.
Many devout followers of any religion or cult are surprisingly violent and zealous if pushed into the right (or wrong) direction.
Versatile doctor and professional soldier, she can save a human life or take it -- whichever the situation calls for.
A expert in both legal and illegal observation methods. Curiously, his resume never states where he learned all this.
You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battle, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
When you want to break an enemy's morale by blowing up his privy, it's time to get yourself a qualified pyrotechnician.
Nobody takes you seriously, because you used to walk around in a silly costume? Well, a child's smile is enough compensation!
Hey detective, did you manage to solve the case of the disappearing donuts yet?

It takes guts to jump out of a plane to face numerically superior foes.
You are well-trained in evading enemy forces and striking where they least expect it.
Far from being a pro, you at least know the basic stuff.

When you've seen it all, nothing can frighten you anymore.
You've been on one or two tours of duty and know trouble when you see it.

Just because it involves no shooting, it doesn't have to be less dangerous.

An imposing sight on the battlefield, you are never one to shy away from taking the enemy head-on.

Creepy, relentless, and socially handicapped - it is only a matter of time before they put you away.
Most of your knowledge comes from books and secondhand reports - and it didn't prepare you for a grim reality of a war zone as well as you thought.

You were already famous in this business before those youngsters were even born. After years of battles, there's hardly anything that can shake you up.
Travel to pristine nature, seek fascinating species, and KILL THEM ALL.
Paired with a sniper, it is your job to make out targets and help in shot calculations
Displaying nerves of steel, you thrive at a job where every mistake can be the last one.
Others might disagree with your methods and accuse you of brutality, but you always get the job done - no matter the cost.
Peaceful protests did not have the results you wanted so you have turned to violent direct action as a mercenary.
You have no moral compass and will cheat everyone out of everything they have while blaming them for their misfortune.
This is your country, your land, your people, and you have pledged your life to free them. More radical than Miguel, you have no leader.
Years of intense physical practice and gameday performance will certainly help you make those last-ditch efforts to survive.
You've been in much, MUCH worse situations, working for several well-known aid organisations.
